name: aireana morris
coverLetter:
I just moved to California two years ago from New York. I am 19 years old, but am very mature for my age. Not your typical when it comes to anything about me. I have been on my own since I was 15 years old, so I have a very big sense of independence and have no problem working on my own. I am down to earth! Love 420! I love films, photography, modeling, networking, styling, etc. I'm very easy to talk to and natural flowing! Full of good vibes, passion, and patience. Prior knowledge in MMJ field. Trimming, growing, production, bud-tending, and distribution experience. I previously started and owned a part of an elite delivery service for only A-list celebrities. Highly experienced in sales. Highly experienced when it comes to business, computers, and office work also. I am also very connected and well aware of all propositions. I have pursued 420 college. Valid CA REC and ID holder. 

Best regards, 
Aireana M.
